description: Try our easy to follow Thai Forest Curry With Lychees recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Southeast Asian curry,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Forest Curry With Lychees Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g green beans, cut into 2.5 cm lengths
20g galangal or fresh root ginger, unpeeled
20 fresh or canned lychees, peeled and stoned

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the measured water in a saucepan, add the curry paste and stir to blend thoroughly. Add the salt and bring to the boil, stirring occasionally.
Lower the heat to a slow boil and add all the other ingredients except the lychees and cucumber. Stir for 30 seconds.
Add the lychees and cucumber and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3-4 minutes. Serve in warmed bowls with steamed jasmine rice. Discard the piece of galangal or root ginger before serving.
